name: TikTok Data Extractor
special_instructions: One of hashtags, profiles or postURLs must be provided, if it is not provided return can_fulfill false and explain accordingly
The maximum number of results that can be scraped in one go is 20
Downloading videos, covers, and slideshow images will increase costs and time required for the scrape
If the requested number of posts is small, the Cheerio crawler (much faster) will be used. If for some reason you need to disable this, turn on the 'disableCheerioBoost' option

Sometimes Tiktok's API will not return author stats (their hearts, follower count etc) for profile/hashtag/sound pages, so an additional query will be needed. This will slow the scraper down, to avoid this, turn on the 'disableEnrichAuthorStats' option
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any privacy or any other limit
